title: ’80s Movie Madness with Ross Mathews
description:
Sports are back and The Daily Smile is getting in on the fun with its own bracket… of ’80s movies. Nikki battles it out with Ross Mathews of RuPaul’s Drag Race to answer the ultimate question — which film will take home the title of ‘80s Movie Madness champion?

Follow Ross on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

Check out Ross’ website to learn about his book, podcast, and more

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Make a great thing even better. Go to OMGyes.com/SMILE for a special discount.
